alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor; Lafayette (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 6:29PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Lafayette, Dixie and southeastern Taylor Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 628 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of heavy showers along a line extending from 11 miles northwest of Steinhatchee to 6 miles west of Manattee Road. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cross City, Steinhatchee, Tennille, Cooks Hammock, Shamrock, Howell Place, Clara, Cross City Airport, Old Town, Jena, Hines, Jonesboro, Salem, Eugene, Fletcher, Yellow Jacket, Fish Creek and Fanning Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor; Lafayette
